content: in this tutorial i have collected different types of mosaic squares each square is unique fascinating and at the same time easy to perform because the technique used here is mosaic crochet do you like working with color and pattern but don t want to mess with a million different threads then mosaic technique is what you need mosaic squares will be the basis for your pillows and blankets the course contains a **video** with key technical points video is in russian but with english subtitles and **12 charts** for mosaic crocheting
